title: 5 day weather forecast
description: This weather app allows user to check the 5-day weather forcast for a specific city. A user can search for a city, view it's current weather conditions and forecast for the next 5 days.

title: Password generator
description: A password generator app which creates strong and secure passwords for users

title: README.md generator
description: This is a command line application which allows users to dynamically generate a readme.md file by answering a series of prompts. Instructions for usage can be found in the readme file within the repository

title: Form Validation
description: A simple form validation. It validates user input for name, email, password, and confirm password fields.

title: Employee Tracker
description: Tis is a web application that allows users to track and manage employee infromation
